resources.string:
Please tap on the button to set this 
tool as your default launcher. If asked again, choose "Always".
This step will be undone after the 
removal of the malware
Please take into account this may remove \nWeChat if you had it previously installed
Please tap on the button to choose \nback your default application launcher.\nDo not choose FluBot Malware Uninstall.
No known FluBot malware \napplication was found on your device
